page.title: 18Whittington Castle Amenities
page.content: The Castle Area is an attractive amenity for tourists.Visitors can park easily to look around the ruins of the {Norman Castle.}The{Castle Tearooms}are used by tourists.Cooked dinners and cold table which has ham,salad,cheese and beef are available.They also sell ice-cream,sweets,cakes,hot and cold drinks or cans.They sell eight different flavours and a variety of hot and cold drinks.In the summer the Castle Tearooms get an average of 250 visitors a day.At the gallery some people come in just look and some of them buy.There is a coat priced Â£8000.That is the most expensive thing but most items range from ten pence to eight pounds.There are some ornaments, dolls and stools which are home made. The gallery opens from Easter to September.There are four people on the staff.
